Title: Kwara to capture transporters’ data for identification, policy planning
Summary: Kwara State Government has concluded plans to begin capturing the data of transport operators for proper identification at designated points . In a statement on Sunday, the Assistant Press Secretary, Bakare Baliqees, said this move was part of policy planning .

Title: UNGA 2025: FG activates empowerment of 10m women
Summary: The Federal Government says it has activated the economic empowerment of no fewer than 10 million women to achieve its one trillion-dollar economy ambition . The government says it wants to achieve the one trillion dollar economy .

Title: Badagry-West LCDA vice chairman Nutayi dies weeks into tenure
Summary: Remilekun Nutayi was the newly elected female vice chairman of Badagry-West Local Council Development Area (LCDA) in Lagos State . The council’s Chief Press Secretary, Zosu Solomon, confirmed her death on Sunday .

Title: Omokri urges Nigerians to study Obasanjo’s life for wisdom, longevity
Summary: Reno Omokri urges Nigerians to study Obasanjo’s life for wisdom, longevity . Special Assistant to former President Goodluck Jonathan has called on Nigerians . He says study should be a guide to living longer and contributing meaningfully to society .

Title: Police arrest six in Benue after deadly attack on tactical teams
Summary: The Nigeria Police Force (NPF) has arrested six (6) suspects in an ongoing response operation in Benue following a deadly attack on Police Tactical Teams by suspected armed herdsmen and local militias at Agu Centre, Katsina-Ala/Ukum Local Government Area of the state .

Title: Nigerian pilgrims in Israel celebrate First Lady Oluremi Tinubu’s 65th birthday
Summary: Nigerian Christian pilgrims on the ongoing 2025 delayed Easter Pilgrimage under the Nigerian Christian Pilgrims Commission (NCPC) have celebrated the 65th birthday of First Lady, Senator Oluremi Tinubu .

Title: Viral video: Excel College explains what happened, steps taken
Summary: The management of Excel College, Ejigbo, Lagos State has said that two separate incidents were merged in the viral video that depicted some misconduct on the part of some students .

Title: Tinubu to declare 2025 Editors Annual Conference open
Summary: The Nigerian Guild of Editors (NGE) will hold its 2025 All Nigeria Editors Conference (ANEC) from November 3-6, 2025 at the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Abuja . Tinubu to declare 2025 Editors Annual Conference open .

Title: Fubara attends first church service after suspension
Summary: Rivers State Governor, Siminalayi Fubara, urged the church and people of the state to remain steadfast in prayers as he begins a renewed journey of governance .

Title: Police arrest six over attack on tactical teams in Benue
Summary: Police said it has arrested six suspects over attack on its Tactical Teams by suspected armed bandits and local militia in Benue . The Nigeria Police Force said it was attacked by armed bandits  and local militia . Police said six suspects have been arrested .
